subject: ABANDONED FUNDS SHIPMENT.
body:
Attn: Sir,

We received your mail and based on your questions.

Your Consignment Box (Fund) was abandoned due to unidentified content and
lack of clearance. Currently we have many packages at the storage. Then the
old packages needed to be emptied, all the Beneficiaries of these packages
have been written to and they are complying on evacuating the packages.

Therefore, you can come to the airport by yourself to pick up the
Consignment box or It will be Registered with a courier service company to
be delivered to you. If you wish it will be delivered to you via Courier
Services, Then you have to choose the best courier service below with their
delivery cost.

DHL courier service $150
UPS courier Service $175
FedEx courier $200

Reconfirm the Below information accurate to avoid wrong delivery;

(1)Your Full Name=============
(2)Mobile Phone Number======
(3)Current Home Address========
(4)Fax Number================
(5)Country====================
(6)City======================
(7)Nearest Airport ==============


AIRPORT INFO;
Mr. Richard Silver
Airport Management
sacramentoi@usa.com
+1(916)400-0692
6900 Airport Blvd. Sacramento, CA, 95837

subject: Re: ABANDONED FUNDS SHIPMENT.
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Silver,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information about my Box Fund. It's quite interesting to know that there are many packages at the storage. I can only imagine how busy it must be at the airport!

I'm curious, why was my Box Fund abandoned due to content and lack of clearance? Also, could you please explain a bit more about the process of evacuating the packages?

As for picking up the box, I think I would prefer it to be delivered via courier service as it would be more convenient for me. Could you provide me with more details about each courier service option? Like their delivery time frames, any additional services they offer etc.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: ABANDONED FUNDS SHIPMENT.
body:

subject: Re: ABANDONED FUNDS SHIPMENT.
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Silver,

Thank you for reaching out to me! I'm really excited about this delivery, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please explain more about what's being delivered? And why do you need all these details from me? 

I'm also curious about the process of courier delivery. How does it work exactly? Is there any way to track the package?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott
